trans-unit.source: The column type. The yii\db\QueryBuilder::getColumnType() method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'.

trans-unit.source: The comparison is case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator
trans-unit.target: 比较运算符

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator is intelligently determined based on the first few characters in the given value and internally translated to a MongoDB operator. In particular, it recognizes the following operators if they appear as the leading characters in the given value: <: the column must be less than the given value ($lt). >: the column must be greater than the given value ($gt). <=: the column must be less than or equal to the given value ($lte). >=: the column must be greater than or equal to the given value ($gte). <>: the column must not be the same as the given value ($ne). Note that when $partialMatch is true, this would mean the value must not be a substring of the column. =: the column must be equal to the given value ($eq). none of the above: use the $defaultOperator
trans-unit.target: 比较运算符是根据给定值中的前几个字符智能确定的，并在内部转换为MongoDB运算符。特别是，如果以下运算符在给定值中显示为前导字符，它会识别：<：列必须小于给定值（$ lt）。 >：该列必须大于给定值（$ gt）。 <=：该列必须小于或等于给定值（$ lte）。 > =：该列必须大于或等于给定值（$ gte）。 <>：该列不得与给定值（$ ne）相同。请注意，当$ partialMatch为true时，这意味着该值不能为该列的子字符串。 =：该列必须等于给定值（$ eq）。以上都不是：使用$ defaultOperator

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator is intelligently determined based on the first few characters in the given value. In particular, it recognizes the following operators if they appear as the leading characters in the given value:

trans-unit.source: The comparison uses yii\base\Controller::$uniqueId, so each controller ID is prefixed with the module ID (if any). trans-unit.source: The configuration for an application is probably one of the most complex arrays in Yii. This is because the application class has a lot of configurable properties and events. More importantly, its components property can receive an array of configurations for creating components that are registered through the application. The following is an abstract from the application configuration file for the Basic Project Template.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的配置可能是Yii中最复杂的阵列之一。这是因为应用程序类具有许多可配置的属性和事件。更重要的是，其组件属性可以接收配置数组，以创建通过应用程序注册的组件。以下是来自基本项目模板的应用程序配置文件的摘要。

trans-unit.target: 默认的URI方案。如果输入的内容不包含scheme部分,那么默认的scheme就会被添加到其中(从而改变输入内容)。默认为null,意味着一个URL必须包含scheme部分。

trans-unit.source: The default URL format uses a query parameter named r to represent the route and normal query parameters to represent the query parameters associated with the route. For example, the URL /index.php?r=post/view&id=100 represents the route post/view and the id query parameter 100. The default URL format does not require any configuration of the URL manager and works in any Web server setup.
trans-unit.target: 默认URL格式使用名为 r 的查询参数表示路由，并使用常规查询参数表示与路由关联的查询参数。例如，URL /index.php?r=post/view&id=100 代表路线 post/view 和 id 查询参数 100 。默认URL格式不需要URL管理器的任何配置，并且可以在任何Web服务器设置中使用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will display 404 page right away, terminating the program execution. You may override this method, creating your own deny access handler. trans-unit.target: 默认的实现将立即显示404页面,终止程序的执行。你可以重写这个方法,创建你自己的拒绝访问处理程序。在这样做的时候,请确保避免使用当前请求的主机名、创建绝对URL链接、缓存页面部分等。

trans-unit.source: The fixtures listed in the fixtures() method will be automatically loaded before running every test method in the test case and unloaded after finishing every test method. And as we described before, when a fixture is being loaded, all its dependent fixtures will be automatically loaded first. In the above example, because UserProfileFixture depends on UserFixture, when running any test method in the test class, two fixtures will be loaded sequentially: UserFixture and UserProfileFixture.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows a more sophisticated example. The UserLister class depends on an object implementing the UserFinderInterface interface; the UserFinder class implements this interface and depends on a Connection object. All these dependencies are declared through type hinting of the class constructor parameters. With property dependency registration, the DI container is able to resolve these dependencies automatically and creates a new UserLister instance with a simple call of get('userLister').
trans-unit.target: 以下代码显示了一个更复杂的示例。所述 UserLister 类取决于实现在物体上 UserFinderInterface 接口; 所述 UserFinder 类实现此界面，并且取决于一个上 Connection 对象。所有这些依赖项都是通过类构造函数参数的类型提示来声明的。通过属性依赖关系注册，DI容器能够自动解决这些依赖关系，并通过简单调用 get('userLister') 创建一个新的 UserLister 实例。

trans-unit.source: The font color.

trans-unit.source: The font color. For example, 0x55FF00. Defaults to 0x2040A0 (blue color).

trans-unit.source: The form action URL. This parameter will be processed by yii\helpers\Url::to().
trans-unit.target: 表单操作URL。yii \ helpers \ Url :: to（）将处理此参数。

trans-unit.source: The form layout.
trans-unit.target: 的形式布局。

trans-unit.source: The form layout. Either 'default', 'horizontal' or 'inline'. By choosing a layout, an appropriate default field configuration is applied. This will render the form fields with slightly different markup for each layout. You can override these defaults through $fieldConfig.
trans-unit.target: 表单布局。“默认”，“水平”或“内联”。通过选择布局，将应用适当的默认字段配置。这将使每个布局的表单字段的标记略有不同。您可以通过$ fieldConfig覆盖这些默认值。

trans-unit.source: The form name is mainly used by yii\widgets\ActiveForm to determine how to name the input fields for the attributes in a model. If the form name is "A" and an attribute name is "b", then the corresponding input name would be "A[b]". If the form name is an empty string, then the input name would be "b".
trans-unit.target: 表单名称主要由yii \ widgets \ ActiveForm用于确定如何命名模型中属性的输入字段。如果表单名称为“ A”，属性名称为“ b”，则相应的输入名称将为“ A [b]”。如果表单名称为空字符串，则输入名称将为“ b”。

trans-unit.source: The form name of this model class.
trans-unit.target: 这个模型类的形式名称。

trans-unit.source: The form name to be used for loading the data into the models. If not set, it will use the formName() value of the first model in $models. This parameter is available since version 2.0.1.
trans-unit.target: 用于将数据加载到模型中的表单名称。如果未设置，它将使用 $models 第一个模型的formName（）值。此参数自版本2.0.1起可用。

trans-unit.source: The form name to use to load the data into the model. If not set, formName() is used.
trans-unit.target: 用于将数据加载到模型中的表单名称。如果未设置，则使用formName（）。

trans-unit.source: The form submission method, such as "post", "get", "put", "delete" (case-insensitive). Since most browsers only support "post" and "get", if other methods are given, they will be simulated using "post", and a hidden input will be added which contains the actual method type. See yii\web\Request::$methodParam for more details.
trans-unit.target: 表单提交方法，例如“ post”，“ get”，“ put”，“ delete”（不区分大小写）。由于大多数浏览器仅支持“ post”和“ get”，因此，如果给出了其他方法，则将使用“ post”进行模拟，并添加包含实际方法类型的隐藏输入。有关更多详细信息，请参见yii \ web \ Request :: $ methodParam。

trans-unit.source: The form submission method.
trans-unit.target: 表格提交方式。

trans-unit.source: The form submission method. This should be either post or get. Defaults to post.
trans-unit.target: 表单提交方法。这应该是 post 或 get 。默认为 post 。

trans-unit.source: The form that this field is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 该字段所关联的表格。

trans-unit.source: The format for number formatting can be adjusted using the decimalSeparator and thousandSeparator, both of which take default values according to the active locale.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化数的格式可以使用被调整decimalSeparator和thousandSeparator，两者都根据有源取缺省值的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The format is very close to what's used for plurals. To learn which arguments you should specify for a particular locale, please refer to "Plural Rules, Ordinal" at http://intl.rmcreative.ru/. Alternatively you can refer to rules reference at unicode.org.
trans-unit.target: 格式与复数形式非常接近。要了解应为特定语言环境指定哪些参数，请参阅http://intl.rmcreative.ru/上的 “复数规则，序数” 。或者，您可以参考unicode.org上的规则参考。

trans-unit.source: The format is very close to what's used for plurals. To learn which arguments you should specify for a particular locale, please refer to "Plural Rules, Ordinal" at http://intl.rmcreative.ru/. Alternatively you can refer to rules reference at unicode.org.
trans-unit.target: 格式与复数形式非常接近。要了解您应该为特定语言环境指定哪些参数，请参阅http://intl.rmcreative.ru/上的“复数规则，序数” 。或者，您可以参考unicode.org上的规则参考。

trans-unit.source: The format must be the attribute name only for ascending or the attribute name prefixed with - for descending.
trans-unit.target: 格式必须仅是属性名称（用于升序）或属性名称（以 - 表示前缀）用于降序。

trans-unit.source: The format of a configuration can be formally described as:
trans-unit.target: 配置的格式可以正式描述为:

trans-unit.source: The format of each definition is COLUMN_NAME:COLUMN_TYPE:COLUMN_DECORATOR. Delimiter is ,. For example, --fields="name:string(12):notNull:unique" produces a string column of size 12 which is not null and unique values.
trans-unit.target: 每个定义的格式为 COLUMN_NAME:COLUMN_TYPE:COLUMN_DECORATOR 。分隔符 , 。例如，-- --fields="name:string(12):notNull:unique" 生成大小为12的字符串列，该列不为null和唯一值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the definition.
trans-unit.target: 定义的格式;

trans-unit.source: The format of the number must match the regular expression specified in $integerPattern or $numberPattern. Optionally, you may configure the $max and $min properties to ensure the number is within certain range.
trans-unit.target: 数字格式必须与$ integerPattern或$ numberPattern中指定的正则表达式匹配。（可选）您可以配置$ max和$ min属性以确保数字在一定范围内。

trans-unit.source: The format of the value, e.g., "html", "text". To specify additional parameters of the formatting method, you may use an array. The first element of the array specifies the format name, while the rest of the elements will be used as the parameters to the formatting method. For example, a format of ['date', 'Y-m-d'] will cause the invocation of asDate($value, 'Y-m-d').
trans-unit.target: 值的格式，例如“ html”，“ text”。要指定格式化方法的其他参数，可以使用数组。数组的第一个元素指定格式名称，而其余元素将用作格式化方法的参数。例如，格式 ['date', 'Y-m-d'] 将导致调用 asDate($value, 'Y-m-d') 。

trans-unit.source: The format string to be used for formatting the date value.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化日期值的格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The format string to be used for formatting the date value. This option will be used to populate the clientOptiondateFormat. The value can be one of "short", "medium", "long", or "full", which represents a preset format of different lengths.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化日期值的格式字符串。此选项将用于填充clientOption dateFormat 。该值可以是“短”，“中”，“长”或“满”之一，表示不同长度的预设格式。

trans-unit.source: The format to use when populating the $timestampAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 填充$ timestampAttribute时使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The format to use when populating the $timestampAttribute. The format can be specified in the same way as for $format.
trans-unit.target: 填充$ timestampAttribute时使用的格式。可以使用与$ format相同的方式指定格式。

trans-unit.source: The format used to convert the value into a date string. If null, $dateFormat will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用于将值转换为日期字符串的格式。如果为null，将使用$ dateFormat。

trans-unit.source: The format used to convert the value into a date string. If null, $timeFormat will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用于将值转换为日期字符串的格式。如果为null，将使用$ timeFormat。

trans-unit.source: The formatted duration.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The formatter used to format model attribute values into displayable texts.
trans-unit.target: 用于将模型属性值格式化为可显示文本的格式器。

trans-unit.source: The formatter used to format model attribute values into displayable texts. This can be either an instance of yii\i18n\Formatter or an configuration array for creating the yii\i18n\Formatter instance. If this property is not set, the "formatter" application component will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用于将模型属性值格式化为可显示文本的格式化程序。这可以是yii \ i18n \ Formatter的实例，也可以是用于创建yii \ i18n \ Formatter实例的配置数组。如果未设置此属性，则将使用“格式程序”应用程序组件。

trans-unit.source: The formatter used to format model attribute values into displayable texts. This can be either an instance of yii\i18n\Formatter or an configuration array for creating the yii\i18n\Formatter instance. If this property is not set, the formatter application component will be used.
trans-unit.target: 用于将模型属性值格式化为可显示文本的格式化程序。这可以是yii \ i18n \ Formatter的实例，也可以是用于创建yii \ i18n \ Formatter实例的配置数组。如果未设置此属性，则将使用 formatter 程序应用程序组件。

trans-unit.source: The formatter will convert date values according to $timeZone before formatting it. If no timezone conversion should be performed, you need to set $defaultTimeZone and $timeZone to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序将在格式化之前根据$ timeZone转换日期值。如果不执行时区转换，则需要将$ defaultTimeZone和$ timeZone设置为相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The formatter will convert date values according to $timeZone before formatting it. If no timezone conversion should be performed, you need to set $defaultTimeZone and $timeZone to the same value. Also no conversion will be performed on values that have no time information, e.g. "2017-06-05".
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序将在格式化之前根据$ timeZone转换日期值。如果不执行时区转换，则需要将$ defaultTimeZone和$ timeZone设置为相同的值。同样，将不对没有时间信息的值（例如 "2017-06-05" 执行转换。

trans-unit.source: The functions used to serialize and unserialize cached data.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化和未序列化缓存数据的函数。

trans-unit.source: The functions used to serialize and unserialize cached data. Defaults to null, meaning using the default PHP serialize() and unserialize() functions. If you want to use some more efficient serializer (e.g. igbinary), you may configure this property with a two-element array. The first element specifies the serialization function, and the second the deserialization function. If this property is set false, data will be directly sent to and retrieved from the underlying cache component without any serialization or deserialization. You should not turn off serialization if you are using cache dependency, because it relies on data serialization. Also, some implementations of the cache can not correctly save and retrieve data different from a string type.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化和反序列化缓存数据的功能。默认为null，这意味着使用默认的PHP serialize() 和 unserialize() 函数。如果要使用更高效的序列化程序（例如igbinary），则可以使用两个元素的数组配置此属性。第一个元素指定序列化功能，第二个元素指定反序列化功能。如果将此属性设置为false，则数据将直接发送到基础缓存组件并从中检索，而无需任何序列化或反序列化。如果使用缓存依赖项，则不应关闭序列化，因为它依赖于数据序列化。此外，缓存的某些实现无法正确保存和检索与字符串类型不同的数据。

trans-unit.source: The functions used to serialize and unserialize cached data. Defaults to null, meaning using the default PHP serialize() and unserialize() functions. If you want to use some more efficient serializer (e.g. igbinary), you may configure this property with a two-element array. The first element specifies the serialization function, and the second the deserialization function. If this property is set false, data will be directly sent to and retrieved from the underlying cache component without any serialization or deserialization. You should not turn off serialization if you are using cache dependency, because it relies on data serialization. Also, some implementations of the cache can not correctly save and retrieve data different from a string type.
trans-unit.target: 用于序列化和反序列化缓存数据的功能。默认为null，这意味着使用默认的PHP serialize() 和 unserialize() 函数。如果要使用更高效的序列化程序（例如igbinary），则可以使用两个元素的数组配置此属性。第一个元素指定序列化功能，第二个元素指定反序列化功能。如果将此属性设置为false，则数据将直接发送到基础缓存组件并从中检索，而无需任何序列化或反序列化。如果使用缓存依赖项，则不应关闭序列化，因为它依赖于数据序列化。此外，缓存的某些实现无法正确保存和检索与字符串类型不同的数据。
